proficient with all kinds of firearms

High-level Lightsaber skills
High-Level intellect
Warriorship

skills.Bacterians:
Infecting any living being to create their twisted specimen.
Large arsenal of mechanical and organic beasts.
Omnipresence

Time and dimensional travel.

Terraforming planets to suit their kind

skills.Ginyu Forces:
Superhuman strength
Superhuman speed
Superhuman durability
Superhuman dexterity
Flight
Ki manipulation
Each members possesses their own different additional combat skills to aid them in battle
skills.Bydo:
Ability to convert any matters (Organic or non-organic: victims are being converted in minds as well their bodies without knowing) into their own (Irreversible)
Ability to construct mobile weapons platforms, and Warships from the size of a fighter, to frigates, destroyers, to massive dreadnoughts
Capability of converting and/or destroying an entire planet
Ability to manipulate, warp, rip open space, time and dimensions
Invulnerability to conventional weapons made by men
Prolific propagators
skills.Witches 5:
'''Eugeal:'''
Utilizing Daimon Heart Snatchers
Uses Heart Crystal capture gun to extract Pure Hearts
Relies on machines and her own inventions
Teleportation
'''Mimet:'''
Utilizing Daimon Heart Snatchers
Uses Charm Buster attack to emit painful sonic waves
Intermediate knowledge of machinery
'''Telulu:'''
Strategic
Using plants called Telluns to extract Pure Hearts
Attacks by using vines that can electrocute her victims
Ability to amply power of her plants into Hyper-Telluns
Knowledge of botany
'''Byruit:'''
Using a master computer to extract Pure Hearts
Uses a bracelet called a nanocuff to shoot a nano ray that can dissolve her enemies
'''Cyprin:'''
Shares her mind and body with Ptilol
Shooting energy waves from staff
Use a glass statue to extract Pure Hearts
Absorb the opponents' attacks in their staffs, and send back a powerful blast back at their opponents
skills.Wolfram and Hart:
Use of man's laws gives them near-unlimited political power
Near-unlimited magical resources
Demonic and human armies that are devoted to evil
skills.Friends of Humanity:
Have many splinter cells and sects, and the degree of activism versus terrorism can vary widely depending on members' personal beliefs.
Throwing considerable support behind anti-mutant politicians.
skills.The Lucavi:
Uses human hosts who allow them to interact with others in Ivalice without drawing attention
Can switch between human and demon form via their Zodiac Stone
Possess Zodiac Stone which serves as a conduit for Lucavi to exist in Ivalice
Agents wield their own different supernatural demonic powers
Commands numerous demonic underlings
Commands unwitting human devouts
Manipulation

skills.NESTS:

goals.Stormtroopers:
Serve the Empire to the best of their ability.
Crush the Rebel Alliance.
Destroy the Jedi.
Restore the Galactic Empire (ongoing).
Crush the Resistance (ongoing).
goals.Death Eaters:
Purify the Wizarding race by killing Mudbloods, Muggle-borns, and blood traitors (partially succeeded).
Conquer wizarding Great Britain and achieve a global dictatorship under a magical regime.
Destroy of all enemies (partially succeeded).
goals.Dark Masters: Destroy the DigiDestined and rule the Digital World forever.
goals.The Order (Silent Hill): Begin the Apocalypse and usher in an eternal Paradise upon the Earth <small>(failed)</small>.
goals.Axem Rangers:
Defeat Mario and his allies (failed).
Recover the sixth Star Piece for their evil king Smithy (accomplished temporarily and then ultimately failed).
Aid the Smithy Gang in ruling the world (failed).
goals.Wild Dog Organization:
Aid their employers in their goals.
Kill V.S.S.E. agents sent to stop them.
goals.Sith:
Destroy the entire Jedi Order (succeeded).
Kill Luke Skywalker or cause him to turn to The Dark Side.
Conquer and rule over the entire Galaxy and destroy everyone who opposes them.
Keep their rule and command over their henchmen and the Galactic Empire (succeeded).
goals.The Four Supreme Generals:
Kill any humans who manage reach the surface world
Defeat team Dai-Gurren
goals.Mavericks:
Replace the humans and rule Earth (failed).
Destroy Mega Man X (failed).
goals.Ginyu Forces:
Defeat Goku, Gohan, and Krillin (failed).
Eliminate Vegeta (failed).
Collect the Dragon Balls for their master Frieza (failed).
goals.Bydo:
Absorb and overtake anything and everything to survive.
Grow, multiply, evolve and expand throughout the universe as far as they can reach.
goals.Smithy Gang: Conquer Mario's world and turn it into a world of weapons (failed).
goals.Witches 5:
Collect pure souls and use their bodies as vessels for Daimon eggs (manga).
Extract pure hearts for Doctor Tomoe (anime).
goals.Wolfram and Hart:
To maintain their interdimensional firm in business
To get Angel to join their side
To bring about Armageddon
goals.Friends of Humanity: Suppress, undermine and ultimately purge Mutants.
goals.The Lucavi:
Resurrect Ultima.
Kill Ramza Beoulve who discovered their plot.
goals.Skaven:
Have world hegemony and eradication of inferior races.
Maintain position of power at any and all cost.
goals.Commando Elite: Destroy the Gorgonites and anyone who ally themselves with the Gorgonites (failed).
goals.NESTS:
Collect fighters' battle datas in the tournament and defeat them by using another team or one of their agents.
Use the data obtained to make their army of unstoppable fighters.
World domination.
goals.Those from the Past: Open the Time Portal to rewrite history as they see fit.
goals.Suppression Squad:
Kill Knothole Freedom Fighters.
Take over Anti Mobius.
Depose their tyrannical leader Scourge and restructure the team.
goals.Shadow Riders: Unlock the power of the Sacred Beasts
goals.Order Soldiers: To protect The Order's members and defend their spiritual beliefs at all costs.
goals.Machine Empire: Annihilate Zeo Power Rangers and annex planet Earth into part of its own imperial domain.
goals.Apostles of the Star:
Rid the world of Chronos.
Recruit Train Heartnet.

goals.1337 Crew: Kill Hank J. Wimbleton and anyone else who opposes the A.A.H.W.
goals.SPECTRE:
Kill James Bond and destroy MI6 (failed).
Take over the entire world (failed).

Succeed for King Bowser and the Koopa Kingdom.
Defeat the Mario Bros.
goals.OCP:

Kill RoboCop.

goals.ACME: Have every person in the world to buy their products.

Destroy the world of the Titans.
